message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANT_VALIDATION_FV_INVALID_APPELLANT
message.locale: The role of the selected participant on the case being appealed cannot be an appellant on the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANT_VALIDATION_FV_INVALID_RESPONDENT
message.locale: The role of the selected participant on the case being appealed cannot be a respondent on the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANT_VALIDATION_FV_INVALID_REQUESTER
message.locale: The role of the selected participant on the case being appealed cannot be a requester on the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANT_VALIDATION_FV_INVALID_THIRD_PARTY
message.locale: The role of the selected participant on the case being appealed cannot be a third party on the appeal case.
